title: Jumma Prayer & Khutbah
description: Weekly Friday congregation. Khutbah begins at 1:00 PM. All welcome.

title: Eid ul-Fitr Celebration
description: Eid prayer and community gathering. Breakfast will be served. Please register for headcount.

title: Youth Halaqa
description: Weekly study circle for youth. Topics include Quran, Hadith, and contemporary issues.
